Package model.interfaces

Interface Player

  • public interface Player
     Assignment interface for Further Programming representing the player
 to be implemented by SimplePlayer class with the following constructor:
          public SimplePlayer(String playerId, String playerName, int initialPoints)
 
 NOTE: playerID is unique and if another player with same id is added it replaces the previous player
    Author:
    Caspar Ryan

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      int getBet()  
      BetType getBetType()  
      java.lang.String getPlayerId()  
      java.lang.String getPlayerName()  
      int getPoints()  
      void resetBet()
      reset the bet to 0 for next round (in case player does not bet again in next round)
      boolean setBet​(int bet)
      NOTE: must use resetBet() for 0 bet since not valid for this method
      void setBetType​(BetType betType)  
      void setPlayerName​(java.lang.String playerName)  
      void setPoints​(int points)  
      java.lang.String toString()  

    • Method Detail

      • getPlayerName

        java.lang.String getPlayerName()
        Returns:
        - human readable player name

      • setPlayerName

        void setPlayerName​(java.lang.String playerName)
        Parameters:
        playerName - - human readable player name

      • getPoints

        int getPoints()
        Returns:
        - number of points from setPoints()

      • setPoints

        void setPoints​(int points)
        Parameters:
        points - - for betting (updated by GameEngineImpl via BetType enum with each win or loss)

      • getPlayerId

        java.lang.String getPlayerId()
        Returns:
        - the player ID which is generated by the implementing class

      • setBet

        boolean setBet​(int bet)
        NOTE: must use resetBet() for 0 bet since not valid for this method
        Parameters:
        bet - - the bet in points
        Returns:
        true - if bet is greater than 0 and player has sufficient points to place the bet

      • getBet

        int getBet()
        Returns:
        the bet as set with setBet()

      • setBetType

        void setBetType​(BetType betType)
        Parameters:
        betType - - enum representing the type of bet being placed

      • getBetType

        BetType getBetType()
        Returns:
        - the betType as set with setBetType()

      • resetBet

        void resetBet()
        reset the bet to 0 for next round (in case player does not bet again in next round)

      • toString

        java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        - a human readable String that lists the values of this Player

        e.g "Player: id=1, name=Come In Spinner, bet=100, betType=RED, points=900"
        (see OutputTrace.txt)
